title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. Quick and delicious!
preparationSteps: Grate the Pecorino Romano cheese finely
Crack eggs into a bowl and beat lightly
Add grated cheese to eggs and mix well
Add freshly ground black pepper to the egg mixture
Cut pancetta into small cubes or strips

cookingSteps.instruction: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil
Add spaghetti to boiling water and cook until al dente
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan over medium heat until crispy
Reserve 1 cup of pasta water, then drain pasta
Remove pan from heat and add drained pasta to pancetta, toss to coat
Add egg and cheese mixture, tossing quickly to create a creamy sauce (off heat to prevent scrambling)
Add reserved pasta water gradually if needed to achieve creamy consistency
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper on top
